parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the instance.

>  You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the IDs of all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances in a specific region.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mmZ format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The value must be an integer that is greater than 0. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values:

*   **30**
*   **50**
*   **100**

Default value: **30**.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mmZ format. The time must be in UTC.
